segments.text: Excuse me . Do you have the time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My watch is a few minutes fast . It's about six forty , I think .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is it ? Oh , no . The concert will begin in twenty minutes . Are we too late to get there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If we start now , we can make it by taxi .
segments.speaker: S2
